abstract: The lawmakers, Republicans and Democrats alike, argue that some proposed rules could force Wall Street’s derivatives business overseas.
snippet: The lawmakers, Republicans and Democrats alike, argue that some proposed rules could force Wall Street’s derivatives business overseas.
lead_paragraph: Win Mcnamee/Getty Images Senator Debbie Stabenow, Democrat of Michigan and chairwoman of the Senate Agriculture Committee.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
